faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Earn Money Back

earning.question: How does the earning system work?
earning.answer: Parents deposit NT$500-1,000 upfront. Kids learn vocabulary daily and take verification quizzes on Day 1, 3, and 7. As they pass tests, points unlock. Parents can withdraw the earned cash anytime.

incomplete.question: What if my child doesn't complete the learning?
incomplete.answer: The deposit remains in your account. You can withdraw unused funds at any time. There's no penalty for not completing - we want learning to be positive!

words.question: How many words will my child learn?
words.answer: Kids learn 10-20 words per day. The platform includes 3,000-4,000 carefully selected words from CEFR standards, Taiwan MOE curriculum, and high-frequency vocabulary.

safe.question: Is this safe for kids?
safe.answer: Yes! Parents control all deposits and withdrawals. The platform uses secure verification to ensure kids actually learn, not just game the system. All accounts are parent-owned.

launch.question: When will the beta launch?
launch.answer: We're targeting a 4-6 week launch timeline. Join the waitlist to be notified as soon as we're ready! Beta users get 50% off regular pricing.

age.question: What age is this for?
age.answer: The platform is designed for elementary and junior high school students (ages 6-15). All accounts must be created and managed by parents (Taiwan's age of majority is 20).

earnings.question: Can I use the earnings for anything?
earnings.answer: Yes! Parents have full control. Use earnings for allowance, toys, savings accounts, special treats, or anything your child wants. It's your money, your choice.

withdraw.question: How do I withdraw money?
withdraw.answer: Parents can request withdrawals anytime through the parent dashboard. Funds are transferred directly to your bank account. Processing typically takes 3-5 business days.

section5.method1: Clicking the "Unsubscribe" link at the bottom of any email we send you
section5.method2: Contacting us directly at the email address provided below
section5.note: Once you unsubscribe, you will no longer receive updates about our beta launch, but your email will remain in our system for record-keeping purposes unless you request deletion.

section6.title: 6. Children's Privacy
section6.content: This waitlist is for parents only. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 20 (Taiwan's age of majority). When our platform launches, we will implement appropriate parental consent mechanisms in compliance with Taiwan's Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA).
